name: ODA
description:
Oda Is a retrowave-style Puzzle Platformer.

It's smart and unusual.

Can it change your perception of space, time and your own life? Hopefully not. But it can enrich your perception of space, it can challenge you with quite unusual swap-mechanics.

There are style, interesting mechanics and almost no story.

You are in a cyberpunk city and you have to go forward. You have the tele-gun, and the name of this gun speaks for itself. Using it you can swap things with each other, swap yourself with objects and do much more tricky actions.

  • Swap position of objects
  • Swap yourself with objects
  • Wrap. It’s hard to explain briefly, but you will understand what it is during the game. For now just... wrap.
  • Solve puzzles of different types, use different approaches
  • Learn and explore (everywhere, not only in game)
